title: U.S. Republican lawmakers warn Trump on tariffs
text:
U.S. Republican lawmakers warn Trump on tariffs   01:35 
U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham on Sunday joined the ranks of Republicans warning President Donald Trump his threats to tax imports of steel, aluminum, and possibly European carmakers would harm U.S. consumers and manufacturers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Senator Lindsey Graham on Sunday joined the ranks of Republicans warning President Donald Trump his threats to tax imports of steel, aluminum, and possibly European carmakers would harm U.S. consumers and manufacturers.
